Title: Sylvan Succor
Description:
Ah, $n, there you are! I've been looking all over for you.

Another of our local critters has been suffering from a distinct lack of affectionate treat-feeding of late. Won't you go and find them something sweet to snack on?
ObjectivesText: Acquire a Celebratory Cake and administer it to the Sorrowful Slyvern.

Objectives.Text: Find or Cook a Celebratory Cake
